DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_14_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="477ef3c3416741e88c415f103b868d11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Great work today![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="477ef3c3416741e88c415f103b868d11" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]It's a shame we couldn't track down any
of our missing Rescue Officers...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_14_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ff491477ff5c42c3aa4f873ecb763c04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We haven't detected any rescue signals
aboveground.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hmm.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ff491477ff5c42c3aa4f873ecb763c04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]The Rescue Corps does attract the
adventurous type...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If any of them were to
find a cave,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they'd probably dive right in.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_14_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="27a907e1e0d1421987707228b299fb37" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That is where we found you, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Tomorrow let's focus on exploring and
seeking out more caves.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3d8bf5b6d32c43b09c8b4c950818f04d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Welcome back, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Glad to see you made
it here in one piece.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="aeae0602a22d4b3da775e408261563cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Of course, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I had no
doubts the emergency-escape system
I developed would function perfectly.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8ce699933aba4d068f5fdcbd175021be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]That may be,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it would've been helpful
if you showed the rest of us how to
actually use it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ce699933aba4d068f5fdcbd175021be" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]One would expect an emergency-escape
device to be a bit more intuitive to use in
the event of an emergency...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="87a5203027ae495fa322c391f59ad88e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Anyhow...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now that you're back, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can
you tell us if you came across any [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Sizai" scale="0.66"/]rocks
like this before we found you?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_Root:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="03de3647f6ef45cba696ce57851859c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oh, Collin, Collin, Collin...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Not only
did I see them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've already completed
very thorough research on this material![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="03de3647f6ef45cba696ce57851859c7" Scale="1"/]I discovered that when heated,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the rocks
become soft and malleable, and can be
shaped into any form you desire.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="03de3647f6ef45cba696ce57851859c7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Its base properties can even change when
exposed to different stimuli.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's quite a
versatile [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]raw material[System:Color name="Default"] indeed!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_After0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="2c585f37e70c4353bd0ae806b60b91b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]"Cool" doesn't even begin to describe it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This is the one![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The ultimate biomass I've
been searching for my entire career!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="0f9206bf2ffe4cd3ab1d392c2f94b962" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]To put it simply,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more of this material
you collect,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more inventions I can whip
up to aid in your search!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_63_Last_P:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="8394e6b25d0b44eda0a73adc05401e32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I'm currently upgrading the 3D printers so
we can put this miracle material to use as
soon as you bring it to the S.S. Beagle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8394e6b25d0b44eda0a73adc05401e32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]It will be crucial to my work in the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lab [System:Color name="Default"]and
any other [System:Color name="Emphasis" ][Grammar:Decap/]Building [System:Color name="Default"]needs that might arise.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a3bf1707de1743df92e4722916146de9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]What a spectacular update, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I knew
bringing along a material scientist would
be key to our success.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a3bf1707de1743df92e4722916146de9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Starting tomorrow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm expecting our
rescue operations to go even more
smoothly than usual now that you're here.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2d54f14552c14bb3af802332086f72fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We should be able to find our Rescue
Officers more quickly, as well.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1728a0cc0ec34c72bcf1c64058a7fb4e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Speaking of which,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we've also discovered
a few castaways besides our own Rescue
Officers and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1728a0cc0ec34c72bcf1c64058a7fb4e" Scale="1"/]There may be more.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What should we do
about them, Captain?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="040d68287466477eb1a75dca8eb4b84c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]There's only one thing we can doâ€”rescue
them.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No matter how many are out there![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="040d68287466477eb1a75dca8eb4b84c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]And once they're here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm confident you'll
take good care of them, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f11f971563c84e2f88876054c2592ab8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Copy that, Captain![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f11f971563c84e2f88876054c2592ab8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Another task for the to-do list...[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_64_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0c147b2614f1462392affd318b79801a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I'm still shocked that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] isn't
the only castaway on this planet.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_64_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="448de33dbb044a848b8dac4f9f5add3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s SOS signal was transmitted
across the entirety of outer space.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="448de33dbb044a848b8dac4f9f5add3d" Scale="1"/]So it's not completely unexpected that the
message would capture the attention of
adventure seekers and draw them here.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_64_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0e629037da8b4995802c36f263fff1c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]And as the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] now it's our
duty to rescue every last one of them!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_64_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="82c82efd03284b0f980174da66815ed7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]I love the enthusiasm![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="82c82efd03284b0f980174da66815ed7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Of course,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more rescues we make,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
the more crowded the Rescue Command
Post will get...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="82c82efd03284b0f980174da66815ed7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I need you to further develop and
expand the Rescue Command Post!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_64_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a3c41650375d46a28d5aa2b16ef8743f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Copy that, Captain![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a3c41650375d46a28d5aa2b16ef8743f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]My list of job duties just keeps getting

DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c23ec5070d2e41f9bae1ee4a9a3c5004" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well, Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we did it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We finally found
our ranger, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a7abf15c0f0f42eda01e7713c5fffc92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Can't believe I had to be saved by the
newbie...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm losing my edge.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0a19964cf0304b93844d682a67562f60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]We're just glad to see you made it back
safe and sound, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you hurt at all?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="7c639af0bc9c4de1aff3e290c6facdd0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not at all, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Heh![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm just,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
touched that you care...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="912bde44603641d38204eb708f9deed2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This table does not seem to be
structurally sound.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's missing screws...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="39fcb9313b244be18855e6199408fa86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]But science guy could stand to worry
a little more.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="39fcb9313b244be18855e6199408fa86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that reminds me, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have
some information regarding our pilot.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a59dfacfa4f345728997b2eb23f7ce27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Do you know his whereabouts?![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Great work, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="e2e0bdc3d92b43c394f47352f87fdf38" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Wha?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Er,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that's not exactly...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="23e1ab12a0b843ee9f36ba21681e2a2a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You must be exhausted from all that
forced sleep you had.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll go over the
details tomorrow.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Go get some rest.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="887f1dd06fdc4f538a97f92d401fd7b4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you got it, Captain![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]She cares about my physical state...
[etc:Wait frame="15"/]That means...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]she cares![System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="df9887d3733c40959957f2041fc9c816" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Before you hit the hay,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please be sure
to review all the details related to our
rescue mission so you're fully prepared!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_03_P11: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="91cc8c4f403f4acf81654c197a60d9c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Is that really necessary?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="40c9c023b63a4277bbd5b2dff642c0d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s back, Captain![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Seems like we're
making progress.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="71dab53ac0834cd08e5352dd33b3b106" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Well done, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="71dab53ac0834cd08e5352dd33b3b106" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]So where is he,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="71dab53ac0834cd08e5352dd33b3b106" Scale="1"/]We need to discuss the leafling situation
as soon as possible.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c7d56a6bf230458a9708b56441e011f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The thing is...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] After the forced-sleep
mode was lifted,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he kind of went right back
to sleep.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c7d56a6bf230458a9708b56441e011f1" Scale="1"/]I think he'd been examining a[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] plant that
only appears at night[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so he was pretty
sleep-deprived.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1d4eb310b1704cd3b9d8837f541d021c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Seriously?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He was out walking around at
night?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Here?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's ridiculously dangerous![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d4eb310b1704cd3b9d8837f541d021c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I suppose I should be grateful that he's
still alive...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="589f31454a1a467c92c0a3b0b504c659" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's strange...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I put a bottle right
here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Where did itâ€”[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="589f31454a1a467c92c0a3b0b504c659" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You didn't drink that liquid that was
sitting right here, did you?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Did you?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="7132d500fa3a4c949f907f18070f43bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Don't shout at me like that![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7132d500fa3a4c949f907f18070f43bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But yeah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was thirsty and it was right
there, so I gave it a try.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who cares?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9ec12f8ab1b94e7484259a3bf34ccda0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that was the medicinal ingredient
that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was using in his experiments.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="bec8eb9dc41a41c9b8a168e876ba94e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]And you never thought to mention that
until now?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bec8eb9dc41a41c9b8a168e876ba94e5" Scale="1"/]Uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why do I suddenly feel very hot?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6359f75487c644fc9b24c6ee00730046" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Are you alright?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe you should go lie
down too, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_04_P09:

until now?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="604e5867e8cd455f849391ec536b4080" Scale="1"/]Uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why do I suddenly feel very hot?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_10_P11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="53aa2e0d79b947cf9149bef6b8398bcb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Are you alright?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe you should go lie
down too, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_10_P12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="89bf38efb41d42d0b5762e2b2be80840" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I suggest we put this meeting on hold for
the time being.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5552538ddaf840b38d30a556c5884aca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]To recap, Captainâ€”today we retrieved
our ranger, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and our doctor, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="67c7b33779004da99cfc8809d1e4ca9c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Can't believe I had to be saved by the
newbie...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm losing my edge.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="155efb98135940949f95240bcfa3ee19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]We're just glad to see you made it back
safe and sound, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you hurt at all?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="3a80f27b6c724c97b8361d895da08301" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not at all, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Heh![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm just,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
touched that you care...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9890447625d1486bbfc07948197e2999" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Where is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I haven't seen him yet.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d31d0921c4a2497f9678b9c4d191ead2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The thing is...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] After the forced-sleep
mode was lifted,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he kind of went right back
to sleep.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d31d0921c4a2497f9678b9c4d191ead2" Scale="1"/]I think he'd been examining a[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] plant that
only appears at night[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so he was pretty
sleep-deprived.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4b39395fee9b4cad88307dcb1cce7ff5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Seriously?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] He was out walking around at
night?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Here?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's ridiculously dangerous![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4b39395fee9b4cad88307dcb1cce7ff5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]I suppose I should be grateful that he's
still alive...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f45cc4e339684338b9c5be1fc662a3bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] by the way, Captain...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I have some
information regarding our pilot.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4c73279dbf8941fe9b17eb372e33957f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That's strange...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I put a bottle right
here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Where did itâ€”[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c73279dbf8941fe9b17eb372e33957f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You didn't drink that liquid that was
sitting right here, did you?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Did you?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="93ab52fe192745c08481a5a991714371" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Tajirogu"/]Hey![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Don't shout at me like that![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="93ab52fe192745c08481a5a991714371" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But yeah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was thirsty and it was right
there, so I gave it a try.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who cares?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c548e025993c4165bbfa53ddb0006a5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that was the medicinal ingredient
that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was using in his experiments.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="80b0d173e0fd4e20a320bec185b2ac2d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]And you never thought to mention that
until now?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="80b0d173e0fd4e20a320bec185b2ac2d" Scale="1"/]Uh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why do I suddenly feel very hot?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="8932bc9e024b4e678f03ff7cc0fa550b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Are you alright?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe you should go lie
down too, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c8c38ddf11cd45e4a7c8d7eb93596099" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Wait![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What were you going to say about
our pilot?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And those [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leafy castaways[System:Color name="Default"]?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_11_P14:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e49a17a348f14fc08e923ef815af81aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Welp,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s down for the count.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess
this conversation will have to wait until
tomorrow...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]when everyone's conscious.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b784ef5f9d4948afae3dc1decc7306e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]At last,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we finally rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Or rather,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a leafling that could be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="08e8f9b2dc744b6295a8213a3474d23a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's right![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've done seriously great
work getting us to this point.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="86386ea884bb445a8b6dab4dad5cf5e7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Incredible work! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]NO doubt about that.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="86f9987d1eb9496f9a22efb4dd5d0f03" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I guess I can give credit where it's due.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Good one, newbie.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="b204f7a392404b2f878b3a520ed94178" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]All we need to do now is cure him of his
leafified status.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c94cf8c9909748fb9b0ab3abbda80ce0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Alaaas,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we have no medicine left in stock.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_12_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="39b2da3afc784a00a1818bc5b1fa18e5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]If that's the case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then starting tomorrow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you'll focus on night expeditions. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Sound
good, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1dfce6ae6e174be3b1de9d37d1430af7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]At last,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we finally rescued Captain Olimar![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Or rather,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] a leafling that could be Olimar!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="977a172cf55b41f091561515777dfd97" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's right![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've done seriously great
work getting us to this point.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="e7db25225f534197995457e8c874ea51" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Incredible work! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]NO doubt about that.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="6481431203fb4514b2c4adee9a4bafc8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I guess I can give credit where it's due.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Good one, newbie.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="04d9009428734731845e495c17ca77b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do we have enough medicine in
stock to administer the cure?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="9da93bf31bfd410084f1275682fe7a12" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We dooo![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I will give him a dose first
thing tomorrow.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_13_P06: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1fea2f05bccd4cf8856b4c8e50968287" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]OK.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] We're counting on you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_15_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cbc6ac31cb7a480bb6c24b699c8ee6f8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Why won't [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] cooperate with us?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_15_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="507aa0425a154f1797f54784a2258acc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] In all honesty,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's always been
something of a mystery to me.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_15_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bad5fb5c78084d20852fd4170bf9469f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It sort of looked like he was imitating
you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Or your leafling
self,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that is.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_15_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6c45d2ce9e994ee8a55b52420996ac6f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] back at work I would tell him to
watch what I do and try to learn from it.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_15_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="546c2a9bdb7648429a395a019c8b20ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Interesting...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So he must be mimicking
youâ€”but not in a good way.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_16_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5f315963aae94aa1a6f53568fabe7a87" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Where did [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] run off to?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I just hope he
isn't involved with anything dangerous.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_16_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1080d1d6bc75484bb695444292fcca3c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You're worried about a troublemaker like
him at a time like this?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_16_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5e7d5cbd82d7412c94420afbf20c1415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I know he steals and eats food that isn't
his,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and he is usually pretty annoying.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s not a bad guy.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_16_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="26ea7f07f365470a99a86833a971d2f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Right,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but he's not that great either...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_17_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3af5ad46e2b94d1bb5f2db92629563a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Dandori skills are quite impressive.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
He must have been one of the top
employees at your company.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_17_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ae143b3df9704c3baea44fed34dff59b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not really.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've never seen him work so
hard or so fast.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_17_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3b3a64da1b38477a80fab99241c57f1c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Some believe that he who knows most
says the least.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe he was hiding his
talents until the moment was right.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_17_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="11fd5815c42942a387a967748b27f1d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My life would've been a lot easier if
he showed them off instead.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_18_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f549ad23f64e4fe9814855af02b81803" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]By the way, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_18_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="00a1a55834864ab3a61230342a25a4a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]If you press [PictureFont:IconData key="Option" scale="0.66"/] and open [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Shortcut Settings[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you can assign different functions to
[PictureFont:IconData key="Up_Button" scale="0.66"/], [PictureFont:IconData key="Left_Button" scale="0.66"/], [PictureFont:IconData key="Down_Button" scale="0.66"/], [PictureFont:IconData key="Right_Button" scale="0.66"/] and [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_L_Stick_Press_L_Stick" scale="0.66"/].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_18_P01_Yo:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0a5bd7d46aac461fb8b06a6d4532966c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]If you press [PictureFont:IconData key="Option" scale="0.66"/] twice and open [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Shortcut
Settings[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can assign different
functions to [PictureFont:IconData key="Press_Stick" scale="0.66"/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_18_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e5e927116d2d4d309dbf89e4d8b60936" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Really?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Can you assign the Rescue
Journal to one of those?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_18_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b93ba38f9c174fc49345999e37b7f4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And then you could reference it
whenever you need some quick advice![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b93ba38f9c174fc49345999e37b7f4ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]You can even assign actions like Disband
or select items [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]at the push of a button[System:Color name="Default"].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_18_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="56b76783150144209a092ea7b8012092" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Setting up [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]shortcuts [System:Color name="Default"]seems like a great
way to improve your Dandori practice.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="56b76783150144209a092ea7b8012092" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Speaking of improvements, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it would
be more efficient if you shared such
helpful information a lot sooner.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_19_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3387e6d170e24e2bb81338a4fe52e29f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you told us you haven't seen any
Koppaites on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is that right?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_19_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7455de0807ea4c2da1337688fb2443c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And I explored quite a bit of the
surface and many caves.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't recall
seeing them at all.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_19_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="365ff0daacc94290a4faa27d37a18229" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If that's the case,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then there's a high
probability that they're located in an
area we have yet to explore.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_19_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ccda0fb34b3748c3ba4fedf594a8c4d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Tomorrow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's focus our search efforts
on an unexplored area!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_20_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9968293e95064941b90526940b3e2c68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We're working off the assumption that
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was abducted and brought to an
unexplored area.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_20_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="300b83f154ce4460997d8baae473768e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Her colleague [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] says
he saw her being carried off by a
mysterious giant dog.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_20_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="482f563d5dba4a88b9e57531bf2e5e1a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]A mysterious giant dog...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wonder how
fluffy it is,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] because that could be a whole
lot of fluff...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="482f563d5dba4a88b9e57531bf2e5e1a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Do you think its eyes are round and cute?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
And what do its ears look like?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And its tail![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="482f563d5dba4a88b9e57531bf2e5e1a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]We need to get to the bottom of this.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's find that dog!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_20_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1e70e80a36dd406e94ce703241ca90b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Isn't our top priority finding [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_21_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1e1c17792b50499bb04ac4f26d278a67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I don't know, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I doubt the tales of my
misadventures on the job would be any
help to the Rescue Corps.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_21_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f63371bd46e94b54b178cc9982c5c5e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I disagree entirely![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe they could
be a useful reference.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Every little bit of
information helps on this planet.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_21_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e12ac70b3c9b46fcbe313dcaeb9d2db1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Alright.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you insist...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_21_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="40fe4cb1c7314baabead1fa97b7d1763" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]First and foremost,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you must understand
that the schedule is the most important
thing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Nobody appreciates late cargo.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="40fe4cb1c7314baabead1fa97b7d1763" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]But the real challenge was learning to
withstand long-distance travel and all the
heavy lifting.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Funny story about thatâ€”
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_21_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0816f4d1e52f40b59f3304374d93f0a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] heh heh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I didn't want to hear stories
about freight management, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want
to hear about your time as a castaway!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_22_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="dbb8efa6a47f492196c5ae32789cdcaf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'd like to build up a large stock of
medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so get back out there and
explore tonight, new blood.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_22_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="357651efbef342f0955560a9109a11ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hold on now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Creatures are more active
at night.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We certainly don't want our
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] to suffer any injuries.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_22_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="34c310302fd44aa9997f9fa8cbd814d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't you fret.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What am I
here for...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]if not to heal those who put
themselves needlessly at risk?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_22_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bd6ebf17c6884251bc970810a7098879" Scale="1"/]I suppose he has a point...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just please be
careful, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_23_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9a6da00aa7de4e3683cd78b0a9162b39" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is a rare breed of dog.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you
happen to know where he was born?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_23_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="df5a25c2ebde4a93a22824fa930acddb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]His ancestors have lived alongside the
Shepherd family for generations.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't
know what planet they're from originally.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_23_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="6e7c6ce7585244e69bfac296d0ead6a1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But these dogs certainly have the perfect
disposition and the right talents for life
as a Rescue Pup.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_23_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9081763e649e45b5bb40691de739bb5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Obviously I'm talking about their carrying
abilities,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but they're also strong diggers
and have noses made for scent tracking.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9081763e649e45b5bb40691de739bb5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Combine that with their excellent vision
and soft, fluffy coats,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and you've got the
perfect partner.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Plus...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]they're so cute!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_23_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="1d38d528e43a4429b9a9582e8cf9b8bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]So then the short answer is...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]no.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_24_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ca726c94f0834cf3a072348f6d0e0985" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] No matter how much I look at them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I'm still confounded.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] These treasures are
mysterious things.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_24_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a6b0d35bfbee45ba9020a95516e271ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Indeed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who made them...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and for what
possible purpose?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_24_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8af6610b94184f50916e50fa99158eb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Think back to that treasure we found the
first dayâ€”the "Stone of Advancement."[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It was able to open and close,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8af6610b94184f50916e50fa99158eb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Maybe it was intended as some sort of
makeshift shelter to protect its creator
from the wind and the rain.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_24_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="00f1a30c123a41cf9975b13969003485" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Interesting theory...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]though likely incorrect.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_25_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="cddca01cca2b4aef85687d7a305be516" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Listen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been wondering about
something.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cddca01cca2b4aef85687d7a305be516" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]If creatures are more aggressive at night,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]not to mention more terrifying with those
creepy, red eyes...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]are we safe here?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_25_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="46885e9143a1426388d7614823a3beb2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Just stay INSIDE the spaceship,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and you'll
have NO problem at all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="46885e9143a1426388d7614823a3beb2" Scale="1"/]And even if we ARE attacked,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we'll be just
fine as long as [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] RIGHT?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_25_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="3ec44330d0f64e918fe289d94c39ae24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Uh, yeah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Of course![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Why's he roping
me into this?![System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_25_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3e133ab0ec08498aaa5e8b8af5cd6556" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]True.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's very reassuring to hear.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Thanks in advance, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_25_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="394e2327cb4d40dc9ec88a477ad0ea8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]No problem.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Happy to help! [etc:Wait frame="15"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Great...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
There's no getting out of it now.[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_26_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7a5abe94bf634685b0863140ca4860ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I don't get it.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why do we fight?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And why
does everything have to be a competition?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_26_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="41ef8b23462a463985bed7de960dd49c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Is something the matter, boss?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_26_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3f50bd1f091048a98d2aa72812336417" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Nah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just a passing thought I had while
watching that Dandori Battle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3f50bd1f091048a98d2aa72812336417" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]It just strikes me as sad.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Here we are,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
all living together and sharing the same
universe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We should be friends,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] not foes.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_26_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="eebc505397bb4601a5700f4082e7fb6d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Makes sense.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But then shouldn't we and,
uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]be friends with all the creatures
of the universe as well?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_26_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ab4d92e5d6ca4fe4849e681ae312850d" Scale="1"/]Creatures?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]No, no.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's an entirely
different situation.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_27_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="99fcc40d83cf43e391ff7e95a337788c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What kind of place is Koppai?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I've always wondered...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_27_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="87ee0ab78dc74937a0dcb1880d62d96c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]From what I've heard,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the population on
that planet is skyrocketing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="87ee0ab78dc74937a0dcb1880d62d96c" Scale="1"/]And if it continues at the current pace,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
they'll soon find themselves in a food
crisis.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Sad, really.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_27_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="819d844b08da4336aa743886af401209" Scale="1"/]That reminds me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We have to plan our
provisions properly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or we won't have
enough for our afternoon snacks.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_27_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="63be4f37075042fab241924cda238612" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm pretty sure she stopped listening at
the mention of "food."
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_28_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a8997e4383824a89beb398bdaf07848d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The castaways on this planet come from
all walks of life.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We have academics,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
business professionals,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] tourists...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a8997e4383824a89beb398bdaf07848d" Scale="1"/]And they've come from so many different
planets.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's an interesting mash-up,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that's
for sure.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_28_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7c861893968a42e6b18e008c8cc25428" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Sounds a lot like the Rescue Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We all hail from different planets and
have our own set of skills too.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_28_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="6cd8875b30644f6aa639a7195b3e5102" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I get that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I like to think of the castaways
and the Rescue Corps as one big family.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're all in the same SHIP, after all![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6cd8875b30644f6aa639a7195b3e5102" Scale="1"/]At this point,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we could even induct these
folks as HONORARY members of the
Rescue Corps!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_28_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="475c6690aeeb476fa8e6a1a7011bb8dd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]That might be going a bit too far.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_29_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2fd25265ad154045896c01b22124346c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]N-nooo...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Halt![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Come no closer!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_29_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9082bffdb2184d7381fb112b156e928a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Captain![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What is it?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What's wrong?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_29_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a8c6a958e4854a1aacdac6df8ba7c1c0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]They're here![etc:Wait frame="8"/] On the S.S. Shepherd![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Pikmin...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]so many Pikmin...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] At this rate...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
we'll be crushed...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_29_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="09aa2604b7d1417a904b3e5149093455" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Uh, Captain?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm not seeing any Pikmin...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_29_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bbc30e4d208246db9086a69104732db5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]BWAH?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh my![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It was just a nightmare.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bbc30e4d208246db9086a69104732db5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]I-I mean it was a dream![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was giving the
Pikmin orders![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And I wasn't afraid at
all.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not one bit!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_29_P05: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b5b181b5070e46319189210fd6494ad9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I totally believe you, boss.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_30_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="11e666c7d2f6471a9fe1a1125e01b9e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] did I hear that you're a
dog fanatic?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="11e666c7d2f6471a9fe1a1125e01b9e8" Scale="1"/]I'm a dog lover too![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have a sweet little
pup at home named [System:Color name="NPC/Default" ]Bulbie[System:Color name="Default"].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_30_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5038fa5ffa294314a9f6a10b96426a83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] How lovely![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Dogs are the best.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What kinds of stuff does [System:Color name="NPC/Default" ]Bulbie[System:Color name="Default"] like?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_30_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="be8eefb5da6149abb2a67362f221dd2d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]He's a dog, so anything![etc:Wait frame="8"/] But he especially
loves Pikpik Carrots.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Watching him eat
those is the cutest thing in the universe.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_30_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a6f580f3ecd449f1b314e761f76afc60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I know exactly what you mean![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Nothing makes me happier than watching
a dog chow down on something they love.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a6f580f3ecd449f1b314e761f76afc60" Scale="1"/]Or when their eyes sparkle when it's time
for their walkies.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Or how they snuggle up
to you, so nice and warm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Their loyalty...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a6f580f3ecd449f1b314e761f76afc60" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You know what we're talking about.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Right, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_30_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0a4ba0d6f2b54ead8c18315ae552aea6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]We'll be talking about
this all night...[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_31_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="fcd590c99892454e995fdc92dd8243e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is from Hocotate,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] isn't he?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_31_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="7aba7ccf2b394874aed80cdd7d27b15c" Scale="1"/]I hear that planet's quite well-known for
its vegetables.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Apparently they're
indescribably delicious.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_31_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cc2c5698a7bd47dc90c939d397f4ea13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]It's always been a dream of mine to one
day eat a genuine Hocotate golden
Pikpik Carrot.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc2c5698a7bd47dc90c939d397f4ea13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But they're so expensive.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I haven't had the
right occasion to justify it.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_31_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="3c9a6fde55d44d0cae1b659875767ee1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah yes.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Golden Pikpik carrots...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just
talking about them brings me back to
Mother's kitchen and her amazing cooking.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3c9a6fde55d44d0cae1b659875767ee1" Scale="1"/]She'd blend them up in a mixer until they
were liquefied.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Nutritious, delicious...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]and
extremely efficient for consumption!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_31_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3d953260262148deb07941a5542b8810" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]She took all those beautiful, expensive
carrots and made...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]juice?![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3d953260262148deb07941a5542b8810" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Does that even count as cooking?[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_32_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="b5d8048050624c938e9475e30c8a32b6" Scale="1"/]This dog, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] comes up quite a lot in
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s Voyage Log.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b5d8048050624c938e9475e30c8a32b6" Scale="1"/]I'm veeery intrigued.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps we'll
encounter her somewhere on
this planet!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_32_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c0ed8331c50c4418a84b57ed60da5ab8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I hope so![etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's a lot that can't be
captured in text alone.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_32_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8a8a40a32f6b45db87ae6cd737f458ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You read my mind![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I could get a tissue
sample of an unknown space-dog species,
[etc:Wait frame="8"/]think of all the experiments I could run!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_32_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="eaf0f6d88aa247e1b503731fd5fd883a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Experiments?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What kind of experiments?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_33_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="be1d725d82c846949dfc91530fb2b6f6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I believe that giant dog thing has
been living alone all this time...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_33_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5794d6db10b941169b06a507675f0202" Scale="1"/]Seems that way.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And if that ragged old
collar is any evidence,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's been on this
planet for a while.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_33_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a73e7dd9a9de42838eb3f866e44bca84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I wonder if it ever got lonely,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] hiding out
in its cave...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]deep within the forest...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_33_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d9b93f15efa6409aba6afa39dbeec5b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Me too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I'm sure living alongside
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] gave it a bit of hope and joy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d9b93f15efa6409aba6afa39dbeec5b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]No one could be lonely with a bond like
that to hold on to.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_33_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="c4ad56e21b3c4e26b664342057fe9744" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Based on what I know about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I find that hard to believe.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_34_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2082273f8a294bd88c7a69525ca60646" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Um...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What are you up to, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_34_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8c21469827024224b77f54c3dbdd88a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Just a little creature research.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The more I
examine these specimens,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more they
intrigue me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8c21469827024224b77f54c3dbdd88a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Their evolutionary processes seem to be
very different from ours...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_34_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5d8b446f1a0144cbb5e7db8c72064989" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I suppose that makes sense.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5d8b446f1a0144cbb5e7db8c72064989" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Out of curiosity, exactly what kind of
research are you conducting?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_34_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d7d368086feb4565b843ee9c032074e1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not really research as much as an
experimental creature-breeding program.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Eheheh...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_34_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="03c1abcfd1c045c78471ea08f628e244" Scale="1"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK. [Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Wait![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Did you say "breeding
program"?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Put an end to that right away!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_35_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7607bb78b5224af59cf3b44ad4cf3cc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Who in the universe is that individual who
keeps carrying castaways into the caves?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_35_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="75df7593c00543e6898d937247fd65b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And what did they say again?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] "Those who
do not embrace Dandori cannot survive
this planet."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's a bit bleak.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_35_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2ba1f434154b42e8a354180c2db233aa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Their way of life must be deeply rooted
in the art of Dandori...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2ba1f434154b42e8a354180c2db233aa" Scale="1"/]Maybe they and even the castaway they
carried off are ghosts of some kind!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_35_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="76eb81db2ba94f0f905db5fa8da546cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So you're afraid of Pikmin and animals,[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
but you get excited about ghosts?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_36_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="45ad0d3d1b7344648330d302b4c1cf5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It's amazing to think of all the unknown
scientific and technological advancements
that must've been made on this planet...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45ad0d3d1b7344648330d302b4c1cf5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I've never encountered so many DOLLIEs
in my life!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_36_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d9b7b1585ad44644ab8689da9dc0f3ad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You believe the treasures are all dollies of
some kind?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_36_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="4248ff812fd7486b81f06ff0b82c0442" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Captain, I'm shocked![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're familiar with
DOLLIES, then?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_36_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f6c9912a6d8c4d6f805ce674ec6de00e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Of course I am![etc:Wait frame="15"/] When I was little,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I played
with my dolly all the time.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_36_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7f6e5a623d8e4b66a854be58e2379163" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No, not a dolly, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] A DOLLIE.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
A "Discovered Object Lacking Logical
and Intelligent Explanation."
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_37_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bb37e2f3eacc462ba0e7f47b49ba0aaf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Isn't it about time you got
back out there and helped us search for
the missing castaways?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_37_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="55e53fb68caf485f91209a1f3da8092d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Maybe.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But who's going to protect the
Rescue Command Post while I'm gone?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_37_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="93e945245e164b9bac08ef8e2f1577a3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And it has been helpful to have [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] on
call to provide any necessary guidance
for [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_37_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="17220b0556d64736a57444ceca33ecf8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I suppose I hadn't considered it that way.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_37_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a7878d938b13456680ab0a55fe47582b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] be sure to consider it in the future![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]That was a close one.[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_38_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="50d0fba2a7284fb0b3359824691cbe43" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]How are you feeling?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Back to your
old self?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_38_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9bf87d8d8d4649fd8d8056c831dba480" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Um, yeah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Fit as a feather over here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Ugh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Why did I say that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So stupid...[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_38_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5b0e0fd2b4d0404e905c6c7fb123c680" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Glad to hear it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then you must be ready to
assist [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_38_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="353d16de59044b7689e430530061f644" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Eh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I dunno. I'm not quite 100 percent yet...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Help out the rookie?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ugh...[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_39_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="88a3625dd36447cbb74cf8634e7b7593" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Hooo, I expect an APOLOGY from you,
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] And you better make it GOOD!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_39_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="4e5ca775c3c1444e83ef1f51c951b527" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Fair enough.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]No surprise he's still angry...[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4e5ca775c3c1444e83ef1f51c951b527" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I messed up.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sorry.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I never should have
run away and abandoned you out there
after the crash.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_39_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="310b2df904f1433eab7245a758ac5f35" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What are you TALKING about?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="310b2df904f1433eab7245a758ac5f35" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]I'm talking about my PIZZA![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It is time for
you to apologize for eating MY pizza
without asking.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_39_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9fbd46366a474722bfe62d12c7130e1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're mad about pizza?![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]This is what I get for being sincere.[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_40_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a780fb92be304c309bdf99778c7b40fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]We lost that Dandori Battle today...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_40_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2f6af3a2232b44b2bc6a08723ffaefea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We need to focus our energy on improving
your Dandori skills.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have a few tricks I
can teach you.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_40_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a258731e94674cf79acf69fcaac74d0b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh yeah![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a258731e94674cf79acf69fcaac74d0b" Scale="1"/]I bet all sorts of Dandori practices are a
part of a captain's regular routine.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_40_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="be82e8044d8d4f67935cc381deb84470" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Exactly.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] For example,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I prepare the food
for the Rescue Pups before their walkies
so they can eat right when they get back.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be82e8044d8d4f67935cc381deb84470" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]Then I give them baths in the order they
finish eating and brush them all at the
same time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ears first,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then tails...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be82e8044d8d4f67935cc381deb84470" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I usually do this every day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so it wouldn't
be an exaggeration to call me an
experienced Dandori master.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_40_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="84dbae1b9fb340ee9b8cc5d3ff632768" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Sadly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't think those examples can be
applied to a Dandori Battle...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_41_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b96b45c23aeb40809ce543aec5bbbc33" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That leafling is quite formidable.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I wish we
had some sort of trick or tip to help us...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_41_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0f90bdd1c59b46bb8e83a137bef284fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A trick?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I may have one of those I
can share.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_41_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e12d91f60138490995a1b2b8d67d2ba9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Excellent![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd love to hear it!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_41_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="79cd42c53ab343b4ae3907bb77e077f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Here's what I think is the key trick to
winning a Dandori Battle...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="79cd42c53ab343b4ae3907bb77e077f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Transport items efficiently and without
any wasted movement.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That'll show your
opponents your Dandori prowess!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_41_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b9dd9ca1f7fe4383bebc77d26b9e7e74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]But if we could do that, we wouldn't need
extra-special tips to begin with.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_42_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9bb0844675ae4867bbdc8d2c0aa8ba88" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm curious, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How is it that you know
how to do so many different things?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_42_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="632e12e52eb34670802699a77fcd7a13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Shucks...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I dunno.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess I've just had a lot
of odd jobs over the years.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="632e12e52eb34670802699a77fcd7a13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]To pay my way through college,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I cleaned
the colony's outer walls and worked nights
doing ship construction.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="632e12e52eb34670802699a77fcd7a13" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I even had a gig collecting space junk at
one point.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Honestly, there's not much I
haven't done.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_42_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f689bd63eee94d8baeb2a8df1e05df1a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Wow.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Sounds like you've been through
the wringer!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_42_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="518ab47509394715ba500e391becb484" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Nah.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Those jobs were all pretty easy
compared to this one!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_42_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="550f6c441d1e45dc95f37e071498f703" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well, this got awkward.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_44_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a96e9b48b2c54f11aae8dd6f71ca135e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]So this is ultra-spicy nectar...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With a color
like that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it even looks spicy.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_44_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a919354ad2bd4d47b1e1c170672b063a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]It is the main ingredient in Ultra-Spicy
Spray, after all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Want to try a lick?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_44_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b6dbefc21187440b9a2d324f88009246" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh, why not?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b6dbefc21187440b9a2d324f88009246" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]If only for quality-control purposes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I wouldn't want to provide my Rescue
Officers with a faulty product![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b6dbefc21187440b9a2d324f88009246" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Now, let's give it a try...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_44_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c69ff818d16f479dad856b1f599c7a6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Erm?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hrrrt![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hrrrrrraaat![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hrrrhhhooot!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_44_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="12e519309d6e442ca148919a476040b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Guess it's pretty spicy![etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I'm glad I wasn't
the one who licked it.[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="12e519309d6e442ca148919a476040b7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]But [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]look how fast you're moving[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just
thinkâ€”with this you could get twice the
amount of work done in half the time!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_44_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="431031a31da74fb381d95b85d7fb8992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hrrrm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] P-p-p-perhaps.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="431031a31da74fb381d95b85d7fb8992" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]But I think ingesting this nectar directly
poses some significant risks...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_45_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="55a12e3babb64867a8f76e41a98829a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We've been stuck in the same place for a
while now, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I suppose that leaves
a pilot like you with a lot of free time.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_45_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="4875133070bb43c29ad4faf868396e3a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not at ALL![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4875133070bb43c29ad4faf868396e3a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]A pilot's work involves A LOT more than
just flying spaceships!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_45_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="224973000b0e46a3bf74bb4944b14e18" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I didn't realize.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] What else does a pilot
do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_45_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="06db7e018963444f9f65b65fe9aff899" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hooo, well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]for starters, I've got to store
up LOTS of extra sleep so I can stay
awake through all the LONG-haul voyages.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_45_P04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="19aac4b5fcb74558b44d432992b543c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm not sure that counts as "work."
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_46_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="699e22d3afd847c0b2d8edbf03b0c173" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's interesting...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="699e22d3afd847c0b2d8edbf03b0c173" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So you press [PictureFont:IconData key="Charge" scale="0.66"/], and it [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]orders the Pikmin
to charge[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Charging Horn seems like
a very useful piece of gear.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_46_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="f353cb2a528c48609bdaa72802283994" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Ah yes, the power of science is nothing
to scoff at.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It makes all things possible![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f353cb2a528c48609bdaa72802283994" Scale="1"/]See,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you change the frequency...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]like this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
now you can make anyone Charge.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f353cb2a528c48609bdaa72802283994" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Let me show you!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_46_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9385ed7d7907474eaf0e0a3de1cf8af4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Wh-what's happening?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My body![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's like
it's moving all by itself!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_46_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6aec6497fb7a450a83f8f17bdd16596d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Stop![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Stop that right now![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What do you
think you're doing, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_46_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="e1de99c6a6fa482eba3fec73d78f316c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Kee-hee![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was just showing you how to
use it in case of an emergency.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_46_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d9aebbb578a54911be4e40df83091fc6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I will do everything in my power to make
sure that "emergency" never ever occurs.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_48_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9cf6abacf0384645912065b0dc9fec1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Has [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail always looked
like this?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_48_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="fb99717a6b894643b6d135643180d659" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Space-dog breeds can be very mysterious.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Perhaps it changed as he grew.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_48_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0e2d2813bdbf496181520546cd8cd5f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he doesn't seem to be suffering from
any health issues as of late.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's just
keep an eye on him for now.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_48_P03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="49e6b27e3c3e4c8d9a024688fb69ac12" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Hopefully it's nothing serious...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_49_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="bc82e2d81acd4ceda967fb214b95cb19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We did it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We rescued all of the castaways
stranded on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd say that's
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]mission complete[System:Color name="Default"]!
