DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_49_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="54ea397e01bc4252865ac44350b5e614" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Great work,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] you two![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What would we do
without [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Thank you both.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_49_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d47085192b1b404ab44e115f53b7e7db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]What about me and science?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My gear
and items have been integral to our
success.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Feel free to thank me as well.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_49_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="130d80aea00d46228eaa329cc356bd8f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]No doubt about it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that was EXCELLENT
work, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_49_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8991ce92367744ddbc43325c433fb665" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Surely, I wouldn't have been able to cure
any leaflings without the brave and humble
work of new blood here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8991ce92367744ddbc43325c433fb665" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is there anything yooou wanted to
say to [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Eheheh!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_49_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="76892b5f48774274a8cdd6e96979e236" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Pshhh...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Just don't let it go to your head.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]But well done, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_50_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="38c941eb4e544ccfb4df1e47a6cd5fc2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Captain,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you were the one who personally
recruited [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to the Rescue Corps,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
isn't that right?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_50_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="130fa95f5da34b59b141ac8f3020c1c3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Yep.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I stopped by the Universal Service
Post Office to send a package a few
years back.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="130fa95f5da34b59b141ac8f3020c1c3" Scale="1"/]Then I heard this voice saying, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]"I can
deliver that package faster than
ABSOLUTELY ANYONE!"
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_50_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9e8d450517ff4e3a8fcb6842a3a036e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] And you didn't think that was kind
of...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]suspicious behavior?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_50_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="cc8098830e644154ba00e85685d49770" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It was pretty suspicious,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I guess.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But he
did deliver my package two days faster
than the other guys.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cc8098830e644154ba00e85685d49770" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Our previous pilot had just retired,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so I
decided to give him a chance.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think it
worked out for the best.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_50_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0d61ed8d6439481f9867fc299c59e970" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It would have worked out even better if he
spoke just a little quieter.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_51_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b97e6947d96c49898b976a81017e7e09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] when I saw those Glow Pikmin-y
things,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] an old memory came back to me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Something I'd almost forgotten...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_51_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="3dc24f88d6a540ef95cbbd7772b26f08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm-hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] What kind of memory?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_51_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="264720d95cdd48e0823b9d6ff0a4902a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It was back at home.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] One day,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] out of
nowhere,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my body suddenly started to
glow![etc:Wait frame="15"/] It lasted for like three days, I think...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_51_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="9f5215ca862543f3818b8b3aabda8c16" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't remember that at all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was
probably just a bad dream or something.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Not worth digging into any further.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f5215ca862543f3818b8b3aabda8c16" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/][System:Color name="NoVoice" ]I hope he doesn't remember anything else...[System:Color name="Default"]
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_52_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0b13740c58af4220aca64ad19bc603df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]By the by, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is there anything you
remember from right before or after you
became a leafling?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Any additional details?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_52_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="59a5e2c548ed46f7855c81f6c0612a84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Not particularly.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It didn't feel bad or
anything like that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it was quite
revitalizing.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="59a5e2c548ed46f7855c81f6c0612a84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]My chronically stiff shoulders and all
the injuries I'd sustained during my
explorations healed immediately.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_52_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="38b596bfcb86467b91c4fe8baced3405" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Perhaps leafification has highly
restorative effects...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="38b596bfcb86467b91c4fe8baced3405" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]This is definitely something worth looking
into,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_52_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="33b47d1a2b4643a8a44588ee7562b76d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]You're not planning any new experiments
now, are you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_53_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="2b97144aaabc47a7b3125ea244a3e256" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Going forward,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we need to prioritize
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s training even more.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2b97144aaabc47a7b3125ea244a3e256" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Prepare plenty of Scrummy Bones
for us to use as rewards.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_53_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="008a956a23304c2abbc934a1ae8455bc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger02"/]Understood, Captain![etc:Wait frame="15"/] How many do you
think you'll need?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_53_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="9428985f208347efbc2a9ad48964ee56" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Good question.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's start with a
thousand or so for now and see how
long that lasts us.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_53_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="ac76735362d8425f95f0a5aa1c14c6d3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]A thousand?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't you think that's
a bit extreme?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_54_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="721cdd9fca974a15980e0e92054e4005" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]We've been on this planet for some time,
Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've got to be used to Pikmin
by now.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Aren't you?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_54_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d47368eb4e8f4e60a6bc47e8b9ae7726" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Of course![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The captain of the Rescue
Corps doesn't get "terrified" or "paralyzed
by fear."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That would be absurd.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_54_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="14f4d0cb16df46b3832d1c657b327b74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Right...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the number of Pikmin is
increasing at an exceptionally high rate.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="14f4d0cb16df46b3832d1c657b327b74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ObieFaceOnly"/]I took a glance inside the Onion the other
day and saw tens,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] maybe even hundreds
of Pikmin eyes staring right back at me...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_54_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="3c6c9de3fad24a9090e1905306e5af19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]What are you trying to do?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] That image is
going to fuel my nightmares for months!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_55_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="91081ebfe7b54a9c90cc338c66b58ad6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]How's that Koppaite doing?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The one
we just rescued.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_55_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b971ce21a3294657afe38e4e0dcf9ad8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We deactivated the forced-sleep mode on
his space suit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The doctor's with him now.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_55_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="94f46cff4d664f77949c40696a0314f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]OK.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then I'll save my questions about
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] for tomorrow.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="63c2272ae3f04a86b40b4e2ad346f4ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you're alright!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="0d48646448cf466aa186b9a255f6472a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I could say the same about you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Now we just have to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="64a2d8b6726c40f1a3bb2da3766513b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]The search for her is currently underway,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but we could use your help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We're in dire need of a lead.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="f94c926c875449f183b40654b5de17fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Actually,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think I might have one![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I remember seeing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] being carried
off by a giant doglike creature!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="55d3dfffb00148e0b6f08582661ca841" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]A giant dog?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you know where it
took her?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="d0151884a55e49ada7925f30d71e200f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not exactly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it was headed [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deeper into
the forest[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Beyond where you found me.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="0709bd41768a4348b4b6580d4fc3af8e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hee...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't believe our radar can
effectively reach that area.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="01306b345a65448d9e619cb9e9997a6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The S.S. Shepherd's radar signal has
already been boosted close to its limit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01306b345a65448d9e619cb9e9997a6e" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure we'll be able to extend its
reach any further...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_56_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="335a713e9bad4b8186a1de8e3661a3e3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you mind if I took a look at it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm pretty good with machines!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_57_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4fc4fe00152c4d489aaf4bb9d60f5cae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]How's the Koppaite doing?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The one we
rescued,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I mean.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_57_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="72f3b23a17a64c3a885346ad93d66fad" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]He's still unconscious.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Think I should
wake him up?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_57_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1eb32a701dfc49799ba78d07e4ff84cb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let him get his rest.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We'll ask him
about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] once he wakes up on his own.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="1e705c2c9c4f4a70948e41af6cf931bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you're alright!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="5ae4f55b5ec94f4d8a2158b45db0b996" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're safe!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="67fa5ca2ad5e4c8caffb1bb6207c38f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I am.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] on the other hand...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know
you're still getting your bearings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but do
you have any idea where she might be?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="98cd519a42fe4446947da0b1c776e9fd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Sorry,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but no.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I lost sight of her early on.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Guess I'm a pretty slow runner.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e7c291eb4a764b369970f57500a31b21" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Then you really were the last person to
see her, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="46fa10a2507d43bd83f223ace47365c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Can you remember anything else?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Which
direction she and the dog ran?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="12d8fcdb1a7f458095a88e8e29dc5adf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Oof...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let me try to put myself back in that
spot...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="12d8fcdb1a7f458095a88e8e29dc5adf" Scale="1"/]Hmm...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="12d8fcdb1a7f458095a88e8e29dc5adf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]I remember something![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="12d8fcdb1a7f458095a88e8e29dc5adf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]The giant dog carried her [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deeper into the
forest[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Way past where I'd fallen down.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="6688262018ab45f2afd0df823a1c6b92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hee...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't believe our radar can
effectively reach that area.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="74520ddc8d2b45f5b1666f8e95a97e99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The S.S. Shepherd's radar signal has
already been boosted close to its limit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="74520ddc8d2b45f5b1666f8e95a97e99" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure we'll be able to extend its
reach any further...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_58_P09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="48b4f95419c043fe99f1f726751da1ba" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you mind if I took a look at it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm pretty good with machines!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="684dbeaff2e5477e8f8fe394654e6bf4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Thank goodness you're alright!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="d64f74ca62dd4aacae50df25be945a5a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I could say the same about you, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f4a99d8c30c640009757b9b53ad9b3fa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do either of you two know a veterinarian
on this planet named [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We've been
trying to locate her for a while now.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="8ac46b42d34a4a52b73d31092fb0cc50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]You have?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And I'm guessing you haven't
found her yet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ac46b42d34a4a52b73d31092fb0cc50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and I are colleagues...
and friends.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We all share a common goal,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
which is why we came here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ac46b42d34a4a52b73d31092fb0cc50" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]But then our spaceship crashed.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d5ae8cc0d8a34b6ab27997174b8292af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm sorry to hear that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How did you manage
after the crash?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="b2e904fa460043088e1f9414eac92319" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Npc:LookAt To="9" Type="2" From="1"/]We just tried to stay alive.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We came
across this glowing kinda syrup.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would
harvest it at dawn and make a juice of it.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d353eed8ff634678855822d9f80ac5a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_26_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/]Really?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must be talking about
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]glow sap[System:Color name="Default"].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="69951fb508584416bae8b86bc54a3433" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_09_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_02_Survivor" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:LookAt To="1" Type="2" From="0"/]Ah, well.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] One day, someone just popped out
of nowhere and stole our juice![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The three
of us ran after 'em.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="69951fb508584416bae8b86bc54a3433" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/][Npc:LookAt To="3" Type="1" From="1"/]But at some point I lost sight of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and next thing I know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s being
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]dragged away by a giant doglike creature[System:Color name="Default"].
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5db5e4d6d51f427b85c376043bc271ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]A giant dog?![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you know where it
took her?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="9b18ac3fabb84ad4bb742c776b4a46dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Not exactly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it was headed [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]deeper into
the forest[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Beyond where you found me.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="647ddbfec24847b8a71390097de15313" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Kee...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]hee...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't believe our radar can
effectively reach that area.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P11:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="487570a738724eea8c4941e90657f17f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]The S.S. Shepherd's radar signal has
already been boosted close to its limit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="487570a738724eea8c4941e90657f17f" Scale="1"/]I'm not sure we'll be able to extend its
reach any further...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_59_P12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="fa0d24b35c704cc9b10b395c7dfda7cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you mind if I took a look at it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm pretty good with machines!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_60_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f016e4140ecf4b5d867372786a3d2ec1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] hasn't woken up yet?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_60_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d1325049d85641a68fc7dfda0f942d2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]She's probably exhausted.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And it's possible
that she hasn't eaten anything since she
crashed onto this planet.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_60_P02: [Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="1b64a2e365844e8eaee0fcdd8f19721e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hey![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wake up![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You alright?!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_60_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Alph"/][UE:Meta key="ed7117009be64e288cf4ea12ad851cd2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]D-[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Dobbs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Quit it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You really want to mess
with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] when she hasn't eaten?
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_60_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Charlie"/][UE:Meta key="e734a7b9df094fd78bf489d7c0ad1082" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Good point.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That could go badly...[etc:Wait frame="30"/] Let's just
leave her be for now.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_60_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e7a51e10df024dada022c712f6333a40" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I expect that she'll wake up by tomorrow
on her own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then we'll ask her to examine
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] as soon as possible.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_61_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="419987e7172e4d5383df7c7912a18581" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hope [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] makes it back
here alright.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_61_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="56b5f008f740457bb4de9737670d4a59" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]According to the radar,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] she's en route
to our location.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_61_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0d578d9fa4c445c0b6b0ffeeb1d4ebd7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Unbelievable![etc:Wait frame="8"/] She's truly amazing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I need to ask [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] about
his training methods.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7fdfc2ef11d5410dad386454743c6af1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Welcome home, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]And you
too, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="eac89d13dfa24d43b33ada501e4fddbc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]They did it![etc:Wait frame="8"/] A magnificent feat!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="25dc61dabe8941889d416ce09e7524cd" Scale="0.96054"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Yeees, yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] good work.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now I need to harvest
some of the fur,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so give me that collar.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="51bb622819ed4c5ab8795d95fd10f6dc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey! [etc:Wait frame="8"/]That thief drank almost all my juice![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Now there are only two left!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6ef2404fd6464422b005f33b511f932e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And we'll be needing those to create the
curative medicine.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="9ceb9fe1faae434d91e3502ad7c96455" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's too bad though. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]It's just
so delicious...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="355b80d7320946d593456fb51c4a6c5d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Speaking of medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we need it right
away.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please hurry!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d8ef04bc7f154627a90225f77a9d18d1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'll have it done by morning.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Brittany"/][UE:Meta key="d04461cdbfd04b7f8632f9d9a7ab24bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I suppose now is a good time for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and
I to have a little chat.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Could you give us
a minute?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d04461cdbfd04b7f8632f9d9a7ab24bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]No need to untie him just yet...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_62_P09: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="d48819d631344786ae15478cf41680b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]OK...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But please remember to keep it civil.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_65_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b13c37afdecb48a48171c07aabf6fdbd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Alright![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Tomorrow let's explore
a new area!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_66_P00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="58e4caf089ca4aad9768d11ef97cbd53" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You are one top-notch explorer!
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_66_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ca7abc7457f649d996f6ae02bbc0772c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]To think that a wise and reclusive leafling
was underneath the Rescue Command
Post this whole time...
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_66_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="2e385872aec54eb5920685b3494ff957" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]From what I can tell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you decide to
enter that cave,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you won't emerge until
nightfall.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_66_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0250f09188ef434196a9d4eed6e7e03d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hmm. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]That means [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]you won't be able to
explore any other area later that day[System:Color name="Default"]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0250f09188ef434196a9d4eed6e7e03d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly2"/]This is a good example of how the art of
Dandori is also crucial to your work as a
Rescue Officer.
DaySpecial.DaySpecial_Area500_Briefing_SP_66_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="d2f7a7f69f89483a8482f4bc2c6ffc6a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That's right.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Make sure you take care of
any outstanding rescue tasks before
entering that cave, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/].
